SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(BODYDATE, 'MM'), '0') BODYMONTH, TO_CHAR(BODYDATE, 'DD') BODYDAY, BODYWEIGHT, MEMBERRATE FROM DAVI_BODY WHERE MEMBERID = #{memberId} AND LTRIM(TO_CHAR(BODYDATE, 'MM'), '0') = #{searchMonth} ORDER BY BODYDATE
